app.use(async (ctx, next) => {
  const start = new Date()
  await next()
  const ms = new Date() - start
  console.log(`${ctx.method} ${ctx.url} - ${ms}ms`)
})

<div>hahah</div>

body {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    font-family: Consolas, "PingFang SC", 'PingFangSC-Semibold', "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, "Nimbus Sans L", Arial, "Liberation Sans", "Hiragino Sans GB", "Source Han Sans CN", "Source Han Sans SC", "Microsoft YaHei", SimHei, sans-serif;
    font-size: 14px;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
    overflow: hidden;
}

#app {
    height: 100%;
}

.el-submenu [class^=fa] {
    vertical-align: baseline;
    margin-right: 10px;
}

.el-menu-item [class^=fa] {
    vertical-align: baseline;
    margin-right: 10px;
}
